content:
I am at Pulkovo, saying good bye - thanks all for a wonderful time. I leave you with these questions:
- what do you want to do with Digital Signatures?
- what do you want to do about language translations for display codes?
- Do you need a 'base Russion FHIR Implementation Guide' in the same way Australia and USA have one, that defines how common identifiers and coding systems specific to Russia are identified, and common extensions for Russian specific issues?

• what do you want to do about language translations for display codes?
    We already have some refbooks mapped to loinc (https://nsi.rosminzdrav.ru/#!/refbook).

  • Do you need a 'base Russion FHIR Implementation Guide' in the same way Australia and USA have one, that defines how common identifiers and coding systems specific to Russia are identified, and common extensions for Russian specific issues?

Is this right link to Australia Implementation Guides - https://simplifier.net/search?scope=National&nationality=AU&category=ImplementationGuide ?
that's some of them. but the base implementation guide is this one: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/
